meanings.definition: Relating to the generation or development of nerves.
meanings.sent1: The neurogenically altered cells showed increased nerve growth.
meanings.sent2: The neurogenically active region of the brain was fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: The neurogenically enhanced robot had a nervous system like no other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked neurogenically, creating intricate neural pathways.
meanings.sent5: The neurogenically modified plants exhibited rapid nerve regeneration.

meanings.definition: In a neurogenic manner or fashion.
meanings.sent1: The nerve impulses traveled neurogenically along the spinal cord.
meanings.sent2: She neurogenically adapted to the new environment with ease.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved neurogenically, mimicking the actions of a nervous system.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed neurogenically, sparking new neural connections.
meanings.sent5: The information was processed neurogenically, enhancing cognitive functions.
